sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Technology runs on power, and while most devices have internal power sources, these either run out or need augmentation. Energy cells are small battery disks that can keep most hand-held devices going for a while longer, while power packs are larger versions suitable for blasters and other high-demand gear. Extra reloads allow characters to ignore an "out of ammo" despair result with a ranged weapon. By spending a maneuver, they may reload their weapons and get back in the fight.   Models Include: Numerous Variants.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Extra Reloads</name> <number>GEAR0001094</number> <price>25</price> <range/> <rarity>1</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:46:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4fe24c382f94a450e0f497eef699b62a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 21:46:14</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
